extracted_information: DocuSign's 'Agreement Preparation' product focuses on intuitively preparing new agreements, enabling users to create and manage agreement templates. It supports accelerated custom document generation and promotes accuracy by leveraging data-driven tools. The system facilitates pulling and dynamically updating data from internal systems to populate agreements, as exemplified by its use for HR teams generating offer letters using employee data, and for financial/sales teams with customer-specific agreements. While a 'Discover Release 1, 2025' is announced for new capabilities, this page does not provide specific details on document template features planned or released in 2025. Information regarding specific template editor functionalities, conditional logic, detailed token/variable system specifications beyond dynamic data pulling, specific integration methods, or supported output formats is not present.

features.name: Template Creation and Management
features.description: Allows for the intuitive creation and management of agreement templates to streamline document preparation.

features.name: Accelerated Document Generation
features.description: Enables the rapid generation of custom agreements in seconds using predefined templates, aiming to eliminate workflow obstacles.

features.name: Data Integration and Dynamic Content
features.description: Facilitates pulling data from internal systems to dynamically populate and update agreement fields, ensuring accuracy and compliance. This includes scenarios like populating offer letters with employee data or sales contracts with customer information.

temporal_info.2025_Relevance: The content mentions 'Discover Release 1, 2025', indicating new capabilities are set to be introduced in 2025 to enhance efficiency and insights. However, this page does not detail specific document template features or enhancements associated with this 2025 release.
